title: Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials using Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Confirm that the user is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.
Verify that the user session is stored and maintained.

title: Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an unregistered email or wrong password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is denied.
Check that an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Validate that a new user can register with valid data and receive the correct role assignment.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in valid user information including email, password, and required profile fields.
Select or assign the appropriate role if applicable.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm registration success and auto-login or redirection to login.
Verify that new user role-based access is enforced.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure users can only access pages and features permitted by their role (owner, admin, sales).

steps.description: Login as an owner user.
Verify owner can access all areas including user management.
Login as an admin user.
Verify admin can access customer, invoice, and package management but not user management.
Login as a sales user.
Verify sales can add customers and view their commission but cannot access admin or owner-only pages.
Attempt to directly navigate to unauthorized routes as each role.
Confirm access is denied or redirected appropriately.

title: Customer Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify that users with proper roles can create, read, update, and delete customer records with validation.

steps.description: Login as admin or owner or sales user.
Navigate to the customer management page.
Add a new customer with all required valid fields.
Confirm the new customer appears in the customer list.
Edit an existing customer record with valid changes.
Verify changes are reflected in the customer list.
Delete a customer record.
Verify the customer is removed from the list.
Attempt to create or edit a customer with invalid data (missing required fields or invalid formats).
Confirm validation errors are displayed and prevent submission.

title: Customer Search and Filter Functionality
description: Verify that the customer list can be searched and filtered effectively by various criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to the customer list page.
Input a search term matching existing customers.
Validate that only matching customers are shown.
Apply filters such as active status, package, or other relevant fields.
Confirm the filtered results are accurate and relevant.
Clear search and filters.
Confirm that the full customer list is restored.

title: Invoice Status Transitions and Payment Input
description: Validate invoice statuses (pending, paid, verified, overdue) update correctly and payment inputs are processed properly.

steps.description: Create or view an invoice with status 'pending'.
Input a valid payment amount less than or equal to the invoice total.
Submit payment.
Verify invoice status changes to 'paid'.
Verify that an admin or owner can verify payment, changing status to 'verified'.
Attempt to input invalid payment amounts (e.g., negative, zero, or exceeding invoice total).
Confirm validation errors appear and payment is not accepted.
Check invoices past due date without payment are marked 'overdue' automatically.

title: Automatic Invoice Creation 7 Days Before Due Date
description: Verify that invoices are automatically generated for active customers 7 days before their due date.

steps.description: Identify customers with active subscriptions and upcoming due dates more than 7 days away.
Simulate system date reaching 7 days before due date.
Verify that new invoices are generated automatically in the system for those customers.
Confirm invoices have correct amount, due date, and status set to 'pending'.
Verify that no invoices are generated prematurely or multiple times for the same period.

title: Package Management CRUD with Validation
description: Test full management (add, edit, delete) of internet packages including speed and pricing with correct input validation.

steps.description: Login as owner or admin with package management access.
Add a new internet package with valid speed and price values.
Confirm the package appears in the package list.
Edit package details with valid updates.
Verify the updated package reflects changes.
Delete an existing internet package.
Confirm removal of the package from the list.
Attempt to create or edit a package with invalid data (e.g., negative speed or price).
Check that validation prevents submission and shows error messages.

title: Commission Calculation and Tracking for Sales
description: Verify commissions for sales users are calculated automatically per customer and payments can be tracked accurately.

steps.description: Login as sales user.
View commission settings and confirm commission rates per customer.
Add a new customer and generate commissions accordingly.
Confirm commission amount is calculated correctly based on settings.
View commission payment status and attempt to update payment as received.
Confirm commission tracking updates with correct payment status.
Login as owner or admin and verify commission settings and reports.

title: Dashboard Displays Accurate Role-Based Statistics
description: Verify that dashboards show correct statistics such as total customers, invoices, and revenue tailored for each user role.

steps.description: Login as owner user and navigate to dashboard.
Verify displayed statistics match backend data for customers, invoices, commissions, and revenue.
Login as admin user and verify dashboard with appropriate data subset.
Login as sales user and verify dashboard shows relevant KPIs (e.g., commissions, customers handled).
Confirm all data is up to date and visually represented correctly.

title: User Management by Owner
description: Test that the owner can create new users with specific roles and modify user roles properly.

steps.description: Login as owner and open user management page.
Add a new user with role admin or sales with valid input data.
Verify user is created and appears in the user list with correct role.
Edit an existing userâ€™s role.
Confirm role update is reflected and access control changes accordingly.
Attempt to create a user with missing or invalid fields.
Check validation errors prevent submission.

title: Date and Currency Format Validation
description: Verify all date and currency displays and inputs use Indonesian locale formats consistently.

steps.description: Navigate to pages displaying dates and currency (e.g., invoices, packages, payments).
Check that dates follow Indonesian format (DD/MM/YYYY or local preferred).
Check prices and currency fields display using Indonesian Rupiah formatting (Rp, thousands separators, decimal points).
Input dates and currency values in forms.
Verify input fields accept correct formats and validation rejects incorrect ones.

title: Responsive UI and iOS 16 Design Compliance
description: Ensure UI components render consistently and responsively across iOS, Android, and Web platforms in line with iOS 16 design system.

steps.description: Launch the application on iOS device or simulator.
Check UI elements match iOS 16 style guide including buttons, cards, colors, and fonts.
Launch on Android device or emulator.
Verify layouts adapt properly with no overflow or misaligned elements.
Launch on a web browser with varied screen sizes.
Confirm responsive behavior and consistent visual fidelity with mobile platforms.
Test navigation and interaction flows for intuitive usage.

title: Routing and Navigation Protection Based on Role
description: Validate file-based routing protects pages according to user roles and prevents unauthorized access.

steps.description: Login as each user role: owner, admin, sales.
Attempt to navigate directly via URL or navigation links to pages exclusive to other roles.
Verify unauthorized pages are inaccessible and user is redirected or shown an error.
Verify that authorized pages open normally for permitted roles.
Confirm that session management persists and revokes access on sign out.

title: Sign Out and Session Management
description: Ensure user can sign out properly and no protected resources are accessible afterward without login.

steps.description: Login as any user.
Initiate sign out from the application.
Verify user is redirected to login page with session cleared.
Attempt to access any protected route after sign out.
Confirm access is denied and user remains logged out.

title: Error Handling on Network or Server Failure
description: Test application behavior and user feedback when backend services or network requests fail.

steps.description: Simulate backend unavailability or server error during login, data fetch, or submission.
Verify the application shows proper error messages or notifications to users.
Check that UI remains stable without crashes or infinite loading.
Retry the failed operation after restoring network.
Confirm operation completes successfully after retry.

title: Cross-Platform Compatibility
description: Verify full functionality and feature parity on iOS, Android, and Web platforms.

steps.description: Perform key flows (login, customer CRUD, invoice management, commission tracking, dashboard viewing) on iOS.
Verify all functions work as intended with no platform-specific issues.
Repeat above flows on Android.
Confirm consistent behavior.
Repeat above flows on Web browser across multiple popular browsers.
Validate UI and functionality consistency.
